name: Lunar Cheese Mining Janitor
description:
**USE FULLSCREEN**

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Lunar Cheese Mining Inc.

149 Darkside Street

The Moon

Dear: [new employee 492]:

You got the job! As a Mining Operation Janitor, you serve the incredibly important role of keeping deadly Corruptions away from our priceless cheese mining robots. Upon arrival of the site you will be given a Broom; This excellent multipurpose tool will be used to Destroy Corruptions and Recover Corrupted Robots! Best of luck out there. Your robots will need it. 

Mr. Mozza-Luna

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

WASD/Arrowkeys to move

Left click to sweep
